geneVariantDescriptions.description: ATG7-RAF1 results from the fusion of ATG7 and RAF1, which demonstrates elevated downstream Mapk phosphorylation in patient samples (PMID: 27624885), and therefore, is predicted to result in a gain of protein function. ATG7-RAF1 fusions are associated with anaplastic pleomorphic xanthoastrocytoma (PMID: 27624885) and pediatric high-grade gliomas (PMID: 28912153).

references.title: Comprehensive Genomic Profiling of 282 Pediatric Low- and High-Grade Gliomas Reveals Genomic Drivers, Tumor Mutational Burden, and Hypermutation Signatures.
Activating NRF1-BRAF and ATG7-RAF1 fusions in anaplastic pleomorphic xanthoastrocytoma without BRAF p.V600E mutation.
